name: Roasted Red Pepper and Almond Dip
author: HurdBird
summary: This versatile dip adds zesty flavor to any food it's served with. Top with additional sliced almonds and diced roasted red peppers, if desired. Serve with pita wedges, crackers, or crudites.
ingredients: 1 cup roasted red peppers, drained and patted dry
directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir almonds until toasted and fragrant, 2 to 4 minutes
Combine toasted almonds and mayonnaise in a food processor; process until finely chopped
Add roasted red peppers, Parmesan cheese, balsamic vinegar, garlic, salt, and pepper; process until desired consistency is reached, scraping down the sides as needed
